div.p: COILED LIKE THE SPRING OF TIME.
LIKE THE COILED SPRING OF TIME.
WHAT IS ROLLED IS MOVING, ROTATING OVER ITSELF INTO ITSELF.
WHAT IS ROLLED UP IS IN THE DARK, TURNED IN ON ITSELF, HIDDEN.
SEEKING ITSELF AS IT SPIRALS INWARDLY.
ITS FRONT LOOKING AT ITS BACK, ITS BACK LOOKING AT ITS FRONT.
TALKING TO ITSELF, CONFRONTING ITSELF, FRONTING ITSELF,
TOUCHING ITSELF, SILENTLY BUT EXCITEDLY STORED.
HAVING LATENT POTENTIAL IT HAS IT'S UNROLLED, UNSEEN,
UNFLAT SELF IN REVERSE, IN RESERVE.
IT IMPLIES MOTION; IT CAN BE UNROLL.
IT WRAPS ITSELF IN A COMFORTING SELF EMBRACE, A CUDDLE.
STORED IN AN ALTERNATIVE ENERGETIC STATE,
WHAT IS NORMALLY SHOWN IS UNSHOWN.
